column4: hehe, its a good learning process, tinkering and repairing linux :)
not when the only reason is the default fixed font isn't defined correctly ...
yeah... i heard about that one too..... i panicked and got it working, beginners luck, quite fast with xfs reinstalled
resinstalled wverything still had to find the bits to edit .... it was a bit like magic roundabout ... and is it me or is breezy faster than hoary ...
